English: Informs all party members of the location of the party leader.
Finnish: Ilmoittaa ryhmän johtajalle ryhmän jäsenien sijainnit.

English: Party leader orders party members to a attack a target.
Finnish: Ryhmän johtaja määrää ryhmän jäsenet hyökkäämään kohdetta vastaan.

English: Party leader orders all party members to retreat.
Finnish: Ryhmän johtaja määrää ryhmän jäsenet perääntymään.

English: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.
Finnish: Increases the Critical Chance on the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% x Amount of party members.

English: Each party member around the leader adds a 5% bonus to party leader damage.
Finnish: Each party member around the leader adds a 5% bonus to party leader damage.

English: Increases the chance of Masquerpets dropping unique items.
Finnish: Kasvattaa mahdollsuuksia uniikkien esineiden putoamiselle Masquerpetseiltä.

English: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist party members recover 1.8 times faster.
Finnish: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist party members recover 1.8 times faster.

English: Increases the amount of items dropped by Masquerpets.
Finnish: Kasvattaa mahdollisuuksia useamman esineen putoamiseen Masquerpetseiltä.

English: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
Finnish: Each party member receives a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member around them. Does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
